import{createMuiTheme,responsiveFontSizes}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import green from"@material-ui/core/colors/green";import blue from"@material-ui/core/colors/blue";import red from"@material-ui/core/colors/red";var NormalThemeObject={HEARTS:{backgroundColor:red[800]},DIAMONDS:{backgroundColor:blue[800]},SPADES:{backgroundColor:"black"},CLUBS:{backgroundColor:green[800]},HIDDEN:{backgroundColor:"grey"},BACKGROUND:{background:"radial-gradient(circle, rgba(194,231,237,1) 0%, rgba(141,178,238,1) 100%)"},TABLE:{// boxShadow: "0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)",
border:"8px solid ".concat(blue[900]),backgroundColor:blue[300]},STACK:{borderRadius:40,backgroundColor:"white",boxShadow:"0 5px 10px rgba(59, 43, 91, 0.7)"},CONTROLLER:{backgroundColor:"rgba(0,0,0,0.24)"},BET:{border:"1px solid white",backgroundColor:green[300]},typography:{fontFamily:"Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif"}};var NEON_BLUE="rgba(0,255,255,1)";var NEON_PINK="rgba(246,110,255,1)";var NEON_GREEN="rgba(0,254,10,1)";var NEON_RED="rgba(255,0,0,1)";var DarkThemeObject={HEARTS:{color:NEON_RED,backgroundColor:"black"},DIAMONDS:{color:NEON_BLUE,backgroundColor:"black"},SPADES:{color:"white",backgroundColor:"black"},CLUBS:{color:NEON_GREEN,backgroundColor:"black"},HIDDEN:{backgroundColor:"black"},BACKGROUND:{background:"black"},TABLE:{boxShadow:"2px 3px 9px ".concat(NEON_BLUE),border:"3px solid ".concat(NEON_BLUE)},STACK:{backgroundColor:NEON_GREEN,boxShadow:"0 4px 9px ".concat(NEON_GREEN),border:"3px solid ".concat(NEON_GREEN),borderRadius:40},CONTROLLER:{backgroundColor:NEON_BLUE},BET:{boxShadow:"0 0px 15px ".concat(NEON_PINK),backgroundColor:NEON_PINK,color:"white"},typography:{fontFamily:"Futura, Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif"}};var NormalTheme=responsiveFontSizes(createMuiTheme(NormalThemeObject));var DarkTheme=responsiveFontSizes(createMuiTheme(DarkThemeObject));export var Theme=NormalTheme;var ThemeSetter=false;export var InitThemeSetter=function InitThemeSetter(themeSetter){ThemeSetter=themeSetter;};export var SetTheme=function SetTheme(themeType){if(ThemeSetter){switch(themeType){case"normal":ThemeSetter(NormalTheme);break;case"dark":ThemeSetter(DarkTheme);break;default:ThemeSetter(NormalTheme);}}};
